languages.text: {n}Мясистые пальцы начальника смены задумчиво барабанят по поясу с инструментами.{/n} "Если эти парни — тертые, то блюстителей возле тайника заметят и не сунутся. О Вашей Светлости и не говорю".

{n}The shift foreman's thick fingers drum thoughtfully on his tool belt.{/n} "If these guys are smart, they'll spot the enforcers near the cache and stay out of sight. And Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} would be spotted even quicker."
languages.original_text: {n}Мясистые пальцы начальника смены задумчиво барабанят по поясу с инструментами.{/n} "Если эти парни — тертые, то блюстителей возле тайника заметят и не сунутся. О Вашей Светлости и не говорю".

traits.locale_text: {n}The shift foreman's thick fingers drum thoughtfully on his tool belt.{/n} "If these guys are smart, they'll spot the enforcers near the cache and stay out of sight. And Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} would be spotted even quicker."

{n}He cracks his knuckles and says with determination,{/n} "We need to set up an ambush by the cache. We can't involve the enforcers, they're too conspicuous. Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} even more so. Our clan is posted here all the time. We won't raise any suspicion."

{n}The shift foreman's thick fingers drum thoughtfully on his tool belt.{/n} "If these guys are smart, they'll spot the enforcers near the cache and stay out of sight. And Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} would be spotted even quicker."

{n}He cracks his knuckles and says with determination,{/n} "We need to set up an ambush by the cache. We can't involve the enforcers, they're too conspicuous. Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} even more so. Our clan is posted here all the time. We won't raise any suspicion."

{n}The shift foreman's thick fingers drum thoughtfully on his tool belt.{/n} "If these guys are smart, they'll spot the enforcers near the cache and stay out of sight. And Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} would be spotted even quicker."

{n}The shift foreman's thick fingers drum thoughtfully on his tool belt.{/n} "If these guys are smart, they'll spot the enforcers near the cache and stay out of sight. And Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} would be spotted even quicker."

{n}The shift foreman's thick fingers drum thoughtfully on his tool belt.{/n} "If these guys are smart, they'll spot the enforcers near the cache and stay out of sight. And Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} would be spotted even quicker."

{n}The shift foreman's thick fingers drum thoughtfully on his tool belt.{/n} "If these guys are smart, they'll spot the enforcers near the cache and stay out of sight. And Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} would be spotted even quicker."

languages.text: {n}El capataz cavila unos instantes, tamborileando con sus gruesos dedos en su cinturón de herramientas.{/n} «Si estos tipos son listos, verán a los guardias rondando el escondrijo y no asomarán la nariz. Y usted, mi{mf|lord|lady}, llamará la atención mucho antes».
languages.original_text: {n}The shift foreman's thick fingers drum thoughtfully on his tool belt.{/n} "If these guys are smart, they'll spot the enforcers near the cache and stay out of sight. And Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} would be spotted even quicker."

traits.locale_text: {n}El capataz cavila unos instantes, tamborileando con sus gruesos dedos en su cinturón de herramientas.{/n} «Si estos tipos son listos, verán a los guardias rondando el escondrijo y no asomarán la nariz. Y usted, mi{mf|lord|lady}, llamará la atención mucho antes».

languages.text: {n}シフト作業長の太い指が、自身の工具ベルトを何かを考えるかのように叩いている。{/n}「こいつらが利口なら、隠し場所の近くにいるエンフォーサーを見つけて、その視界に入らないようにするでしょうな。陛下なら、もっとすぐに見つかっちまいます」
languages.original_text: {n}The shift foreman's thick fingers drum thoughtfully on his tool belt.{/n} "If these guys are smart, they'll spot the enforcers near the cache and stay out of sight. And Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} would be spotted even quicker."

traits.locale_text: {n}シフト作業長の太い指が、自身の工具ベルトを何かを考えるかのように叩いている。{/n}「こいつらが利口なら、隠し場所の近くにいるエンフォーサーを見つけて、その視界に入らないようにするでしょうな。陛下なら、もっとすぐに見つかっちまいます」

languages.text: {n}领班将手指缠在了工具的带子上，若有所思。{/n}“要是那些人很狡猾，他们说不定会发现藏匿处附近的执法者。要是这样，恐怕他们就再也不会现身了。至于大人您，您就更显眼了。”
languages.original_text: {n}The shift foreman's thick fingers drum thoughtfully on his tool belt.{/n} "If these guys are smart, they'll spot the enforcers near the cache and stay out of sight. And Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} would be spotted even quicker."

traits.locale_text: {n}领班将手指缠在了工具的带子上，若有所思。{/n}“要是那些人很狡猾，他们说不定会发现藏匿处附近的执法者。要是这样，恐怕他们就再也不会现身了。至于大人您，您就更显眼了。”

languages.text: {n}Der Vorarbeiter der Schicht trommelt mit seinen dicken Fingern gedankenverloren auf seinem Werkzeuggürtel.{/n} "Wenn diese Burschen clever sind, sehen sie die Enforcer am Versteck und lassen sich nicht blicken. Und Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} würde noch schneller bemerkt."
languages.original_text: {n}The shift foreman's thick fingers drum thoughtfully on his tool belt.{/n} "If these guys are smart, they'll spot the enforcers near the cache and stay out of sight. And Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} would be spotted even quicker."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Vorarbeiter der Schicht trommelt mit seinen dicken Fingern gedankenverloren auf seinem Werkzeuggürtel.{/n} "Wenn diese Burschen clever sind, sehen sie die Enforcer am Versteck und lassen sich nicht blicken. Und Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} würde noch schneller bemerkt."

languages.text: {n}L'air songeur, le contremaître tapote de ses doigts noueux sa ceinture à outils.{/n} « Si ces types ont deux sous de jugeote, ils repéreront tout de suite les prévôts postés près de la cache et ils éviteront de se montrer. Quant à vous, Votre Seigneurie, vous seriez {mf|démasqué|démasquée} en moins de temps qu'il n'en faut pour le dire. »
languages.original_text: {n}The shift foreman's thick fingers drum thoughtfully on his tool belt.{/n} "If these guys are smart, they'll spot the enforcers near the cache and stay out of sight. And Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} would be spotted even quicker."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'air songeur, le contremaître tapote de ses doigts noueux sa ceinture à outils.{/n} « Si ces types ont deux sous de jugeote, ils repéreront tout de suite les prévôts postés près de la cache et ils éviteront de se montrer. Quant à vous, Votre Seigneurie, vous seriez {mf|démasqué|démasquée} en moins de temps qu'il n'en faut pour le dire. »

languages.text: {n}Vardiya ustabaşının tombul parmakları, alet kemerinin üzerinde hafifçe tıkırdıyor.{/n} "O alçakların kafaları çalışıyorsa zulanın yakınında infazcıları fark ettiklerinde ortaya çıkmazlar. {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'ni ise çok daha hızlı fark ederler."
languages.original_text: {n}The shift foreman's thick fingers drum thoughtfully on his tool belt.{/n} "If these guys are smart, they'll spot the enforcers near the cache and stay out of sight. And Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} would be spotted even quicker."
